title: 安装fabric 无法启动游戏
author: PinkNoise
txt_content:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/objectweb/asm/commons/Remapper
        at net.fabricmc.loader.game.MinecraftGameProvider.lambda$static$0(MinecraftGameProvider.java:52)
        at net.fabricmc.loader.entrypoint.EntrypointTransformer.<init>(EntrypointTransformer.java:42)
        at net.fabricmc.loader.game.MinecraftGameProvider.<clinit>(MinecraftGameProvider.java:52)
        at net.fabricmc.loader.game.GameProviders.create(GameProviders.java:27)
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.knot.Knot.init(Knot.java:78)
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.knot.KnotClient.main(KnotClient.java:26)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.objectweb.asm.commons.Remapper
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 6 more

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
删除libraries文件夹 让启动器自动补全
用的是什么启动器？

replies.author: 地球照样转
replies.txt_content:
直接使用l安装好Fabric的整合包
或者从中提取出libraries文件夹覆盖掉你自己的libraries文件夹
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
